import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Provision a new bucket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/providers/{provider_id}/orgs/{org_id}/provision"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Provision a new bucket in the organization account, also creates the organization account if it doesn't exist. This is an
idempotent operation, and calling it multiple times with the same parameters will not create duplicate buckets.

Provisioning API responds with an access key and secret to access the newly provisioned bucket.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  </summary><div>

        param={{"name":"org_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Organization ID","schema":{"type":"string"}}}

          collapsible={false}
          name={"org_name"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}

          collapsible={false}

                collapsible={false}
                name={"storage_class"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"StorageClass (string)"}

                schema={{"type":"string","description":"Storage class for the bucket. Default is `STANDARD`.","enum":["STANDARD","STANDARD_IA","GLACIER","GLACIER_IR"],"title":"StorageClass"}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"enable_object_acl"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"boolean"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If set to true, per object ACL will be enabled. Default is false."}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem>
            </div>
          </details>
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"user_role"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"OrgMembership (string)"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`Admin`, `Member`]"}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"Role assigned to the user in the organization","enum":["Admin","Member"],"title":"OrgMembership"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
